title: Multivariate time series anomaly detection via separation, decomposition, and dual transformer-based autoencoder
details: S Fu, X Gao, B Li, F Zhai, J Lu, B Xue, J Yu, C Xiao - Applied Soft Computing, 2024
abstract: Multivariate time series usually have entangled temporal patterns and various anomaly types. Meanwhile, they often contain both continuous and discrete features. Many existing methods directly model correlations in complex multivariate time …
